description:
If you are using an agile approach like Scrum or Kanban, you will know that impediments can prevent your team from reaching their goals. This short course will help you notice many more impediments in your environment, and give you ideas for how to tackle them.

This course will teach you what impediments are, how to recognise them and some techniques to solve them.

We include some videos with exercises, a workbook to use and a short quiz at the end to cement all your learnings.

This course should not take you more than 40 minutes, including time to do the exercises.
title: Make your agile team faster and more productive.
instructors: Samantha Laing, Karen Greaves, Growing Agile
